bilingual.welcome: Willkommen/Welcome! Bitte wähle deine Sprache/Please choose your language.
bilingual.invalid_language_warning: Die Optionen sind/The options are: de, en.

de.please_enter_operation: Bitte gib die Operation an, die du ausführen willst (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
de.invalid_operation_warning: Diese Operation ist nicht bekannt. Bitte gib eine gültige Operation ein.
de.repeat?: Willst du noch etwas anderes ausrechnen? (Y um weiterzumachen)

en.goodbye: We enjoyed calculating for you. Good-bye!
en.please_enter_operation: Please enter the operation you would like to perform (add, subtract, multiply, divide)
en.invalid_name_warning: Make sure to enter a valid name.
en.invalid_number_warning: Hmmm ... this is not a valid number. Go again.
en.invalid_operation_warning: Hmmm ... this is not a valid operation. Go again.
en.repeat?: Do you want to perform another calulation? (Y to calculate again)
